regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()
You see (?:a single exit|exits) leading .+$
There are no obxious exits.

Trigger.name: City Focus Alert
Trigger.script:
local channel = matches[2] local focus_type = matches[3] local room = matches[4]
raiseEvent("city focus alert", channel, focus_type, room)

regexCodeList.string: ^\((.+)\): A focus has appeared nearby a linked (shrine|monument) at (.+)\.$
A palpitating tremor resonates from the leylines as a lesser focal point is tapped for its energy.

Trigger.name: Killing Blow (Player)
Trigger.script:
local player = matches[2]
raiseEvent("killing blow", "player", player)

regexCodeList.string: ^You have slain (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Killing Blow (Mob)
Trigger.script:
local mob = matches[2]
raiseEvent("killing blow", "mobile", mob)

regexCodeList.string: ^Having slain (.+), you retrieve the corpse\.$
You do not have enough mana for that.
Alas, your mana reserves are too low for that.
You are lacking the mana to do that.

Trigger.name: Invalid/No Target
Trigger.script:
local tar = matches[2]
raiseEvent("no target found", tar)

regexCodeList.string: ^You can find no such target as '(.+)'\.$
^You can find no such target as '(.+)'\.$
This location has been declared free of violence, by order of the Divine Ones.
^You have been slain by (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Player Prone
Trigger.script:
local player = matches[2]
raiseEvent("player prone", player)

regexCodeList.string: ^Losing (?:his|her) balance, (\w+) falls from (?:his|her) steed to the hard ground\.$
^(?:\w+) knocks the legs out from under (\w+), sending (?:him|her) sprawling to the floor\.$
^With a quick thrust from the butt end of (?:.+), (?:\w+) knocks (\w+) to the ground\.$
^You knock the legs out from under (\w+) and send (?:him|her) sprawling\.$
^(\w+) sits down\.$
^(A cloaked figure) sits down\.$
^(\w+)'s broken legs cause (?:him|her) to fall to the ground in a heap\.$
^(\w+) leaps up in what is apparently an attempt at a graceful swan dive\. (?:He|She) smacks headfirst into the ground\.$
^(\w+)'s legs give way as (?:his|her) (?:right|left) leg breaks\.$
^You step into the attack on your (?:.+), grab (\w+) by the arm, and throw (?:him|her|it) violently to the ground\.$
^Your foot slams into (\w+), knocking \w+ off \w+ feet\.$
^The bola goes flying at (\w+)'s legs, entangling them in ropes and tripping (?:him|her|it) up, before returning back to its owner\.$
^(\w+) is swept off (?:his|her|its) feet by the blast\.$
^Brandishing .+ \w+ (?:slam|slams) into (\w+), throwing (?:him|her|it) to the ground\.$
^(\w+) is blasted backward as \w+ wills an expulsion of energy from (?:his|her|its) staff, the blow knocking (?:him|her|it) to the ground\.$
^A pair of vines suddenly lashes out from the undergrowth to entangle (\w+)\.$
^\w+ lifts (\w+) easily, swinging (?:his|her|its) body before smashing (?:him|her|it) to the ground\.$
^\w+ lifts (\w+) triumphantly into the air, then yanks (?:him|her|it) down into (?:his|her|its) raised knee with back breaking force\.$
^\w+'s mount knocks (\w+) to the ground, (?:his|her|its) spear slicing into (?:his|her|its) flesh\.$
^(\w+) leaps from (?:his|her|its) mount's back, soaring through the air to slam into (\w+)\.$
^(\w+) rides in from the \w+, dragging (\w+) along in (?:his|her|its) jaws\.$
^(\w+)'s eyes close suddenly as (?:he|she|it) falls asleep\.$
^(\w+) closes \w+ eyes, curls up into a ball and falls asleep\.$
^(\w+) tumbles in from the .+\.$

Trigger.name: Player Unprone
Trigger.script:
local player = matches[2]
raiseEvent("player unprone", player)

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) stands up and stretches (?:his|her) arms out wide\.$
^Strange clicking comes from the lips of (\w+) as (?:she|he) kips up and back into the Scorpion stance\.$
^With a fierce roar, (\w+) kips up into a pouncing stance\.$
^With a loud screech, (\w+) kips up into a strange posture, a look of pure menace flashes in (?:his|her) eyes\.$

Trigger.name: Combat Message
Trigger.script:
selectString(matches[3], 1) if isAnsiFgColor(14) == false then return end
local caster = matches[2] local skill = matches[3] local target = matches[4]
raiseEvent("combat message", caster, skill, target)

regexCodeList.string: ^(.+) tumbles out of the corpse of (.+)\.$
Password correct. Welcome to Aetolia\.$
^You have no (.+) stored in the cache.$

Alias.name: Open Profile Directory
Alias.script: os.execute([[start "" "]] .. getMudletHomeDir() .. [[\"]])

Alias.name: Command-Line Lua Execution
Alias.script:
local f, e = loadstring("return " .. matches[2]) if not f then f, e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = f() if r ~= nil then display(r) end

Alias.name: Display Lua Value
Alias.script: assert(loadstring("display(" .. matches[2] .. ")"))()

Alias.name: Toggle Debugging
Alias.script: if debugMode ~= true then debugMode = true notify("Debugging <a_green>activated<a_grey>.") else debugMode = nil notify("Debugging <a_red>deactivated<a_grey>.") end

Alias.name: Delete Old Profiles/Maps
Alias.script: deleteOldProfiles(matches[3], matches[2] == "maps")

Alias.name: Parse as Game Text
Alias.script:
local s = matches[2]
s = string.gsub(s, "%$", "
") feedTriggers("
" .. s .. "
") echo("
")

Alias.name: Color Table Lookup
Alias.script:
local count = 0 notify("Matching Colors:")
if matches[3] then for k, v in pairs(color_table) do if k:find(matches[3]) then setFgColor(getRGB(k))
if count == 2 then echo(k .. "\n") count = 0 else echo(k .. string.space(25 - string.len(k))) count = count + 1 end
resetFormat() end end else for k,v in pairs(color_table) do setFgColor(getRGB(k))
if count == 2 then echo(k .. "\n") count = 0 else echo(k .. string.space(25 - string.len(k))) count = count + 1 end
resetFormat() end end
send("\n")

Alias.name: Character Table Lookup
Add Room Exit
Alias.script:
if not buildingBaseName then notify("No basename specified! Use <a_red>.base <a_grey>to set it.") return end
sendAll("redit " .. matches[2] .. " add exit to " .. buildingBaseName .. matches[3], "map fill", false)

Alias.name: Create Room
Alias.script: if matches[3] then send("create room " .. matches[3], false) else send("create room", false) end send("map fill")

Alias.name: Brief Description
Alias.script: send("redit set brief_desc " .. matches[2], false)

Alias.name: Verbose Description
Alias.script: send("redit set verbose_desc " .. matches[2], false)

Alias.name: Environment
Alias.script: send("redit set environment " .. matches[2], false)

Alias.name: Set Basename
Alias.script:
buildingBaseName = matches[2]
notify("Basename set to <a_green>" .. buildingBaseName .. "<a_grey>.")

Alias.name: City Unlock Move
Alias.script:
local dir = getProperDirection(matches[2]) local oDir = getOppositeDirection(dir)
sendStack("city unlock door " ..dir, "open door " .. dir, dir, "close door " .. oDir, "city lock door " .. oDir)

Alias.name: Speedwalking
Alias.script:
local dest = matches[2]
if dest == "help" or dest == "list" or dest == "rooms" then raiseEvent("speedwalking list") else raiseEvent("speedwalking waypoint", dest) end

Alias.name: Improved Emoting
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "" then send("em " .. matches[3], false) else send("em \(" .. matches[2] .. "\) " .. matches[3], false) end

Alias.name: Clantell
Alias.script:
local chan = matches[2] local msg = matches[3]
if chan == "parse" or chan == "run" or chan == "lol" or chan == "crafters" then if chan == "lol" then send(matches[1], false) elseif chan == "crafters" then send("crafters " .. msg, false) end
return end
send("clan " .. chan .. " tell " .. msg, false)

Alias.name: OOC Tell
Alias.script: send("tell " .. matches[2] .. " // " .. matches[3], false)

Alias.name: Leader Tell
Alias.script: send("leadertell " .. matches[2], false)

Alias.name: Credits/Coins For Sale
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "i" then send("ironcoins for sale", false) else send("credits for sale", false) end

Alias.name: Tattoo Making
Alias.script:
local target, type, limb
target = matches[2] type = matches[3] limb = matches[4]
for k,v in ipairs(aetolia.tattoos[type]) do send("outc " .. v .. "ink", false) end
send("ink " .. type .. " on " .. limb .. " of " .. target, false)

Alias.name: Offer Corpses
Alias.script: if cd.player.name == "Lin" then sendStack("sac corpses", "offerings show") else sendStack("offer corpses", "offerings show") end

Alias.name: Bag/Pack Interaction
Alias.script:
local dir = matches[2] local bag = matches[3] local item = matches[4]
if bag == "b" then bag = "bag" elseif bag == "p" then bag = "pack" elseif bag == "pp" then bag = "pouch" end
if dir == "in" then send("put " .. item .. " in " .. bag, false) elseif dir == "out" then send("take " .. item .. " from " .. bag, false) end

Alias.name: Context Actions
Alias.script:
local num = tonumber(matches[2])
if not cd.actions[num] then send(matches[1], false) return end
send(cd.actions[num].command, false)

Alias.name: Currency Reports
Housewho
Alias.script: send("housewho", false)

Alias.name: Godfeelings
Alias.script: send("godfeelings", false)

Script.name: Initialization
Script.script:
-- Tools to govern the setup of Godspeaker at its lowest level. Establishes the -- presence of all required folders, and loads any scripts located in 'scripts' local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local path = getMudletHomeDir() local profiles = path .. slash .. "current" local scripts = path .. slash .. "scripts"
isDirectory = function (d) if lfs.attributes(d) ~= nil and lfs.attributes(d).mode == "directory" then return true end
return false end
-- Ensure the primary scripts folder is installed, or create it if not. CheckForScriptsFolder = function () if isDirectory(scripts) then return end
local origin_dir = lfs.currentdir() lfs.chdir(path) lfs.mkdir("scripts") lfs.chdir(origin_dir) end
-- Handler to load files dynamically. LoadScriptFile = function (f) if isDirectory(f) then return end
if not f:match("^.+%.lua$") then return end
success, err = pcall(dofile, scripts .. slash .. f)
if success ~= true then notify("<a_green>LoadScriptFile()<a_darkgrey>: <a_red>" .. err) return end
loadedScripts[script_file] = {name = script_name, desc = script_desc} notify("Loaded <forest_green>" .. f .. " <a_grey>successfully!") end
-- Load any .lua files found in the scripts folder. LoadFromScriptsFolder = function () CheckForScriptsFolder()
if not isDirectory(scripts) then error("LoadFromScriptsFolder(): Unable to find 'scripts' folder in profile directory.") return end
loadedScripts = {} for file in lfs.dir(scripts) do LoadScriptFile(file) end end

Script.name: System Information
Script.script:
gs = gs or {}
gs.version = "0.1" gs.name = "Godspeaker" gs.mudlet_version = "3.4.0"

Script.name: System Update and Synchronization
Script.script:
-- Called shortly after startup, and once an hour thereafter to check for updates -- to the main system. Also manages the updating of code from the main Github repo. local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local path = getMudletHomeDir() local profiles = path .. slash .. "current" local distro = path .. slash .. "distro"
-- Create the "distro" folder if it doesn't already exist. CheckForDistroFolder = function () if lfs.attributes(distro) ~= nil and lfs.attributes(distro).mode == "directory" then return end
local origin_dir = lfs.currentdir() lfs.chdir(path) lfs.mkdir("distro") lfs.chdir(origin_dir) end
-- Find the most recent profile .xml. GetNewestProfile = function () if lfs.attributes(profiles) == nil then return end
local profile_table = {}
-- Collect files in the profile folder and store their modification date. for filename in lfs.dir(profiles) do if filename ~= "." and filename ~= ".." then profile_table[#profile_table + 1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(profiles .. slash .. filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort these files by newest to oldest. table.sort(profile_table, function (a, b) return b.last_mod < a.last_mod end)
return profile_table[1] end
-- Copy the newest profile and send it to the folder containing the repo.

Script.name: Lua Library Extensions
Script.script:
-- Extended, MUD-oriented functionality tacked on to the default Lua methods. -- In most cases (read: anything not involving tables), will work just like -- the original functions, eg. myvariable:jright()
-- String
getmetatable("").__mod = function(a, b) if not b then return a elseif type(b) == "table" then return string.format(a, unpack(b)) else return string.format(a, b) end end
local noTitleWords = { "a", "an", "the", "and", "of", "in" }
string.title = function (str) if type(str) == "string" then str = str:gsub("([a-zA-Z']+)", function (word) if table.contains(noTitleWords, word) == false or word == str:match("^%w+") then word = string.upper(word:sub(1, 1)) .. string.lower(word:sub(2, -1)) return word end end) return str else return str end end
string.right = function (str) str = tostring(str) return string.rep(" ", cd.sys.wrapWidth - string.len(str)) .. str end
string.center = function (str) str = tostring(str) return string.rep(" ", (cd.sys.wrapWidth / 2) - math.round(string.len(str) / 2)) .. str end
string.trim = function (str) str = tostring(str) return str:gsub("^%s*(.-)%s*$", "%1") end
string.space = function (x) x = x or 0 return string.rep(" ", x) end
string.truncate = function (str, n) str = tostring(str)
if str:len() > n then return str:sub(1, n - 3) .. "..." else return str end end
string.wrap = function (str, limit, indent, indent1, tail) indent = indent or "" indent1 = indent1 or indent limit = limit or cd.sys.wrapWidth tail = tail or ""
local here = 1 - #indent1 return indent1 .. str:gsub("(%s+)()(%S+)()", function(sp, st, word, fi) if fi - here > limit then here = st - #indent
return "\n" .. indent .. word end end) end
string.wrap2 = function(str, maxLen, ind, dec) -- str: The message. -- maxLen: Column the message can write to. -- ind: How many spaces to indent the message by. -- dec: Decoration. Should be a string only.
maxLen = maxLen or 72 ind = ind or 0 dec = dec or "" local endDec = dec if dec == "[" then endDec = "]" elseif dec == "\(" then endDec = "\)" elseif dec == "\<" then endDec = "\>" elseif dec == "\{" then endDec = "\}" end
local decSpace = ind - (dec:len() + 1) if decSpace < 1 then decSpace = 1 end
-- Output is a table into which lines of text are stored. local output = { [1] = "" }
-- Break the string apart. str = str:split(" ")
-- Create the head of the string. if dec ~= "" then table.insert(str, 1, string.space(decSpace) .. dec .. " ") elseif ind == 0 then table.insert(str, 1, "") else table.insert(str, 1, string.space(ind)) end
-- Form lines based on string length. local length = 0 local line = 1 for i, txt in ipairs(str) do local l = txt:len() if i > 2 then l = l + 1 end -- To account for the space. length = length + l if length <= maxLen then if i > 2 then output[line] = output[line] .. " " .. txt else output[line] = output[line] .. txt end else -- New line. length = l + ind line = line + 1 output[line] = string.space(ind) .. txt end end
-- Put the end decoration on the tail. if endDec ~= "" then output[line] = output[line] .. string.space(maxLen - string.len(output[line])) .. endDec end
return table.concat(output, "\n") end
string.jleft = function (str, amt) str = tostring(str)
if not str then error("No string passed to string.jleft().") end if not amt or amt < 0 then amt = 0 end
return str .. string.rep(" ", amt - str:len()) end
string.jright = function (str, amt) str = tostring(str)
if not str then error("No string passed to string.jright().") end if not amt or amt < 0 then amt = 0 end
return string.rep(" ", amt - str:len()) .. str end
string.jcenter = function (str, amt) str = tostring(str)
if not str then error("No string passed to string.jright().") end if not amt or amt < 0 then amt = 0 end
local space = amt - str:len() local cut1 = math.round(space / 2) local cut2 = space - cut1
return string.rep(" ", cut1) .. str .. string.rep(" ", cut2) end
-- Table
table.shuffle = function (t) assert(t, "table.shuffle() expected a table, got nil") local newTable = t local iterations = #newTable local j
for i = iterations, 2, -1 do j = math.random(i) newTable[i], newTable[j] = newTable[j], newTable[i] end
return newTable end
pairsByKeys = function (t, f) local a = {}
for n in pairs(t) do table.insert(a, n) end
table.sort(a, f) local i = 0 local iter = function () i = i + 1 if a[i] == nil then return nil else return a[i], t[a[i]] end end
return iter end
table.sentence = function (t) assert(t, "table.sentence() expected a table, got nil.")
local table_string = ""
if #t == 0 then return "" end if #t == 1 then return t[1] end
for i = 1, #t do local append = " "
if #t > 2 then append = "," .. append end if i == #t then append = append .. "and " end if i ~= 1 then table_string = table_string .. append end
table_string = table_string .. t[i] end
return table_string end
-- Math
math.round = function (num, idp) local mult = 10 ^ (idp or 0) return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult end

Script.name: Mudlet Extensions
Displays and Information
Script.script:
debugEcho = function (str, token) token = token or "D" if debugMode == true then cecho("\n<dim_gray>\<<yellow>" .. token .. "<dim_gray>\> <grey>" .. str) end end
notify = function (str, ...) local lines = {...} local output = "<a_darkcyan>" .. gs.name .. " <a_darkgrey>| <a_grey>" .. str .. "\n"
for i = 1, #lines do output = output .. string.space(gs.name:len() + 3) .. lines[i] .. "\n" end
cecho(output) end

Script.name: Deleting Old Profiles
Script.script:
-- From the standard Mudlet library.
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Script.name: handleSystemEvents
Script.script:
local SysLoadHandler = function () LoadFromScriptsFolder() end
local SysExitHandler = function () end
local SysDownloadDoneHandler = function (file) end
local SysDownloadErrorHandler = function (err) end
local SysConnectionHandler = function () end
local SysDisconnectionHandler = function () end
local SysProtocolDisabledHandler = function (protocol) end
local SysProtocolEnabledHandler = function (protocol) end
local SysDataSendRequestHandler = function (input) -- Reminder: denyCurrentSend() will prevent the input from going through. end
handleSystemEvents = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Mudlet raised " .. e .. ".") if e == "sysLoadEvent" then SysLoadHandler(...) elseif e == "sysExitEvent" then SysExitHandler(...) elseif e == "sysDownloadDone" then SysDownloadDoneHandler(...) elseif e == "sysDownloadError" then SysDownloadErrorHandler(...) elseif e == "sysConnectionEvent" then SysConnectionHandler(...) elseif e == "sysDisconnectionEvent" then SysDisconnectionHandler(...) elseif e == "sysProtocolDisabled" then SysProtocolDisabledHandler(...) elseif e == "sysProtocolEnabled" then SysProtocolEnabledHandler(...) elseif e == "sysDataSendRequest" then SysDataSendRequestHandler(...) end end

Script.name: handleMapperEvents
Script.script:
local MapOpenHandler = function () end
local SysManualLocationSetHandler = function (room) end
local SysMapDownloadHandler = function () end
handleMapperEvents = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Mudlet raised " .. e .. ".") if e == "mapOpenEvent" then MapOpenHandler(...) elseif e == "sysManualLocationSetEvent" then SysManualLocationSetHandler(...) elseif e == "sysMapDownloadEvent" then SysMapDownloadHandler(...) end end

Script.name: handleWindowEvents
Script.script:
local SysWindowResizeHandler = function (x, y) end
local SysWindowMousePressHandler = function (element, x, y) end
local SysWindowMouseReleaseHandler = function (element, x, y) end
handleWindowEvents = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Mudlet raised " .. e .. ".") if e == "sysWindowResizeEvent" then SysWindowResizeHandler(...) elseif e == "sysWindowMousePressEvent" then SysWindowMousePressHandler(...) elseif e == "sysWindowMouseReleaseEvent" then SysWindowMouseReleaseHandler(...) end end

Script.name: handleIRCEvents
Script.script:
local SysIRCMessageHandler = function (sender, target, message) end
handleIRCEvents = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Mudlet raised " .. e .. ".") if e == "sysIrcMessage" then SysIRCMessageHandler(...) end end

Script.name: handleMiscEvents
Script.script:
local SysTelnetHandler = function (telnet_type, option, message) end
local SysSoundFinishedHandler = function (file, path) end
handleMiscEvents = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Mudlet raised " .. e .. ".") if e == "sysTelnetEvent" then SysTelnetHandler(...) elseif e == "sysSoundFinished" then SysSoundFinishedHandler(...) end end

Script.name: handlePackageEvents
Script.script:
local SysInstallHandler = function (object) end
local SysUninstallHandler = function (object) end
local SysInstallPackageHandler = function (package, file) end
local SysInstallModuleHandler = function (module, file) end
local SysSyncInstallModuleHandler = function (module, file) end
local SysLuaInstallModuleHandler = function (module, file) end
local SysUninstallPackageHandler = function (package) end
local SysUninstallModuleHandler = function (module) end
local SysSyncUninstallModuleHandler = function (module) end
local SysLuaUninstallModuleHandler = function (module) end
handlePackageEvents = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Mudlet raised " .. e .. ".") if e == "sysInstall" then SysInstallHandler(...) elseif e == "sysUninstall" then SysUninstallHandler(...) elseif e == "sysInstallPackage" then SysInstallPackageHandler(...) elseif e == "sysInstallModule" then SysInstallModuleHandler(...) elseif e == "sysSyncInstallModule" then SysSyncInstallModuleHandler(...) elseif e == "sysLuaInstallModule" then SysLuaInstallModuleHandler(...) elseif e == "sysUninstallPackage" then SysUninstallPackageHandler(...) elseif e == "sysUninstallModule" then SysUninstallModuleHandler(...) elseif e == "sysSyncUninstallModule" then SysSyncUninstallModuleHandler(...) elseif e == "sysLuaUninstallModule" then SysLuaUninstallModuleHandler(...) end end

Script.name: handlePrompt
Script.script:
local PromptHandler = function () end
handlePrompt = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Custom event raised " .. e .. ".") -- TO-DO: Add conditions for a 'misc prompt' event. if e == "prompt" then PromptHandler(...) end end

Script.name: handlePlayerMovement
Script.script:
local PlayerMovementHandler = function (dir, mod) playerMove(dir, mod) end
handlePlayerMovement = function (e, ...) debugEcho("Custom event raised " .. e .. ".") if e == "player movement" then PlayerMovementHandler(...) end end
